name: Block Styler For Gravity Forms
author: WP Tools

sections.description:
Style gravity forms with the gutenberg block editor. Get real-time feedback on the style updates within the super fast gutenberg editor.

This plugin provides a gutenberg block called Gravity Form Styler Refer to screenshot 1. You can embed a gravity form and set all the gravity form shortcode parameters. You can also style the gravity forms button‘s background, text typography, margin, padding, border and border radius.

We also offer a premium version of this plugin.

Premium version provides additional styling options. Refer screenshot 3 and the overview video below.

Here is a brief overview of the plugin with the free & premium options enabled.
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin from https://wordpress.org/plugins/block-styler-for-gravity-forms/
  2. Upload & activate the plugin via the WordPress admin. To learn more refer to this guide
sections.faq:
Any dependencies for this plugin?

Plugin depends on Gravity Forms (affiliate link)

Is there a premium version for this plugin?

Yes. Details on the premium version can be found at https://wptools.app/wordpress-plugin/gutenberg-block-styler-for-gravity-forms/

We offer a FREE TRIAL for the premium version.
